    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static float CALIBRATION_PERIOD
      Constant specifying how many nanoseconds the calibration period will last - a shorter calibration period will produce a more inconsistent calibration
      protected ImuHandlerService.CalibrationState calibrationState
      Flag indicating if the calibration phase has ended.
      protected Quaternion currentOrientationQuaternion
      The quaternion that holds the current rotation
      protected java.util.List<Handler> handlers
      The list of handlers for each sensor
      protected java.util.List<Sensor> sensorList
      The list of sensors used by this provider
      protected SensorManager sensorManager
      The sensor manager for accessing android sensors
      protected java.lang.Object syncToken
      Sync-token for syncing read/write to sensor-data from sensor manager and fusion algorithm
